output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240022" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Ludovic Orban, who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, multiple: - Discusses presidential elections strategy - Promotes parliamentary candidates - Explicitly asks for votes ("Votați copacul, votați poziția 6") 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication
The post discusses both presidential and parliamentary elections, making it complex. While parliamentary campaign is still allowed, the presidential campaign mentions after the end of the campaign period make this problematic.
The post explicitly refers to the presidential elections strategy and Ludovic Orban's decision regarding the presidential race, while also promoting parliamentary candidates.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Makes direct references to presidential elections - Has clear electoral objective - Is a paid advertisement reaching wide audience - Contains explicit voting instructions
conclusion.message-for-police: SC NESTAL ALLNEGREA SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unui mesaj electoral referitor la candidatul prezidențial Ludovic Orban după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea cu ID-ul 924450862487265 constituie propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7) prin referirea directă la candidatul prezidențial, având obiectiv electoral explicit și adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook. Postarea a fost activă după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale prezidențiale.
